mapper.sql: id, type_id, title, source, createtime, commcount, readcount, author, sharecount, ifhot, ifreport, pic
mapper.select: select * from t_news join t_type on t_news.type_id=t_type.id where t_news.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_news
id,
type_id,
title,
source,
createtime,
commcount,
readcount,
author,
sharecount,
ifhot,
ifreport,
pic,
content,

mapper.update:
update t_news
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
commcount = #{commcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
readcount = #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sharecount = #{sharecount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ifhot = #{ifhot,jdbcType=BIT},
ifreport = #{ifreport,jdbcType=BIT},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_news set type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commcount = #{commcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readcount = #{readcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sharecount = #{sharecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ifhot = #{ifhot,jdbcType=BIT}, ifreport = #{ifreport,jdbcType=BIT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
